## Bio 🧘🏻‍♀️

Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologic-implementation researcher from Thailand. Her works aims to promote equity in HIV care engagement in Thailand and globally. She has a growing interest in overcoming missing data problems, particularly related to missing outcomes due to loss to follow-up and competing event, and applying observational-implementation research approach to rapidly generate evidence to inform real-world interventions and policies.

During her free time, Sita enjoys windsurfing, scuba diving, hiking, and hanging out with her long-distance dog, Sam 🐶.
